item.title: Whose name, Whose Power: Rethinking Marriage Traditions
item.description: A reflection on the Constitutional Court ruling that lets men take their wivesâ€™ surnames, and what it reveals about the colonial roots of our so-called marriage traditions.

item.title: Getting Comfortable with the Uncomfortable
item.description: Why resisting uncertainty fuels fear, and how leaning into the discomfort opens the door to possibility
